channel.title: Recognizing Java
channel.description: Well.... I am using a Windows Vista and its different then when I was using Windows XP, I cannot get my system to "find the path specified" im not 100% sure on how im supposed to make it so my computer can find the path..... I went into environmental valuables and added in the classpath + path and still nothing. Could somebody please help me further? I havnt been able to do anything server-related on this computer, including running clients. Help is very much appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 08:03:42 pm[/size][hr]Anyone able to help? :\

item.title: Recognizing Java
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Well… I am using a Windows Vista and its different then when I was using Windows XP, I cannot get my system to “find the path specified” im not 100% sure on how im supposed to make it so my computer can find the path… I went into environmental valuables and added in the classpath + path and still nothing. Could somebody please help me further? I havnt been able to do anything server-related on this computer, including running clients. Help is very much appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 08:03:42 pm[/size][hr]Anyone able to help? :\
